abstract: New York Jets cannot win unless they score more points, a reality that, as they prepare to face the New England Patriots, seems at once a monumental undertaking and a not-unreasonable possibility.
snippet: Any hope the Jets have in toppling New England on Sunday rests with their ability to disrupt and harass Tom Brady as they did during their playoff victory in January.
lead_paragraph: Any hope the Jets have in toppling New England on Sunday rests with their ability to disrupt and harass Tom Brady as they did during their playoff victory in January.

headline.main: Patriots’ Offense Soars as Defense Stumbles
headline.print_headline: The Patriots’ Ineffective Defense Could Cure What Ails the Jets
headline.seo: Facing a Sturdy Patriots Offense, Jets Focus on Exploiting a Shaky Defense
